response.content: Marta Hearthwood smiles warmly. "Welcome to the Drowsy Dragon! The village is a quiet place, just a few farms and a blacksmith, but there’s a rumor about a hidden cave near the old mill—some say it holds forgotten treasure."

ef696556d079ff69486e0d2c3f3f5a44f284c539.request_summary: sys:You are roleplaying as an NPC ... | msg:The player character says to 0... | tools:11

response.content: “Most of the trade in Hereford comes from the merchants who set up shop at the market square—there’s a spice trader named Liora who deals in rare herbs, a stout‑blacksmith called Brann who sells sturdy wares, and a traveling merchant, Joren, who brings goods from the coast. Keep an eye on their stalls; they’re usually honest but always look for a good deal.”
